remarks: If ` A <s B ` , then the intersection of all the ordinals that have differing signs in ` A ` and ` B ` exists.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 22-Feb-2012.)
statement:
sltintdifex $p |- ( ( A e. No /\ B e. No ) -> ( A <s B -> |^| { a e. On | ( A ` a ) =/= ( B ` a ) } e. _V ) ) $.
$d A a $.
$d B a $.
